text:
Gwen Stefani is stuck in the mansion where ex Gavin Rossdale cheated with the family nanny — because he won't lower the price, RadarOnline.com has learned exclusively!

The Beverly Hills pad carries a whopping $35 million price tag, but it's only worth about half that, and Gavin refuses to budge, sources told RadarOnline.com.

"Gwen is trapped!" dished a source. "You have to hand it to Gavin. He's worked this out so Gwen has to sleep in the same house where he cheated on her.
title: Gwen Trapped In $35M Sex House! Gavin Won't Budge On Price Of Home He Cheated In
